lexUnit.name: fortunate.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: favoured by or involving good luck.

sentence.text: For many the comparison is not with those who are more fortunate but with their own past position .
I felt I was fortunate in being in a position to brighten the lives of radio listeners .
We 've been fortunate that no one has seen us .
We are fortunate to have men of such commitment and expertise amongst us and we need to support them by our prayers .
It was fortunate that there was such a man as Tonino in Fontanellato .
Britain has been particularly fortunate in acquiring the sorts of institutions which she did acquire .
We were particularly fortunate to have Father John Watson , Father Tony Quinn and Father Michael Murray with us .
The last was more fortunate .
For children less fortunate than ourselves
In answer to my question as to the source of his income he replied : ` I have been extremely fortunate .
We are fortunate in Lothian to have good existing interagency links ; this has made the development task much easier .
It is fortunate that Bridges had copies of most of them .
` FORTUNATE Newton , happy childhood of science …
The reality is that few of you will be as fortunate .
` I assure you , you have had a fortunate escape . "
We 're very , very fortunate , I think , in being able to use the university facilities here because they really are ideal .
It was fortunate indeed that we had put him in a cell with another person .
Bjor , from Galteland in southern Norway , was less fortunate .
I am perhaps fortunate in having lived in a number of other countries .
I am sure that he will wish to develop that issue in Committee , if he is fortunate enough to be a member .
Perhaps it was fortunate that he had no inkling of how trying it was going to be .
It was fortunate for you that I never insisted on accompanying you . "
It was fortunate that this did not extend to people .
A very fortunate one . ”
How fortunate Paul was to have married such a woman !
It is highly unlikely that you are reading this book if you happen to be one of the fortunate few !
Nor was he fortunate as a shopper .
